title: Ep 5 | Tiger Woods vs Jesus, Treasure Hunting, and Genesis
description:
Why do we call water "water"? What would happen if Tiger Woods played golf with Jesus? And why is Jase digging a big hole in his yard? These questions and more will be answered in this week's episode of Unashamed. 

See more episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

 

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1

 

To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
